resources:
A community-made app 월드 선택 월드 월드 Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer 설정 정보 도움말 변경 로그 월드를 열 수 없습니다, 저장 공간 읽기/수정 권한이 없습니다! 앱을 재시작해서 수정/작성 권한 요청을 허용해주세요. No custom markers! There are no custom markers yet! \n You can create one by long-tapping on the place on the map where you want a marker, then tap \"Create custom marker\". Then choose a marker icon and a Y-coordinate. And then check if you can find it here! 이 앱은 Protol Lambda(이)가 만들었습니다 (Link removed as he asked to), contributed by @MithrilMania, @flagmaggot, @MeowCat, @MiemieMethod, Manuel, ScrapperBox25, Tcbdxh and many others as well.\n\n Available on Google Play.\n\n Current active github repository: github.com/oO0oO0oO0o0o00/blocktopograph Feel free to star or fork, help with the project or simply add your own language support. Your github contribution is welcomed! More information (including the roadmap, changelog and help-information) can be found at: blocktopograph.protolambda.com. \n \n Please make a backup of all your loved MCPE worlds in case of data-corruption!\n NOTE: Minecraft might not load a whole world because of a single corrupt chunk of NBT!\n \n This app is built and tested for MCPE 1.9.x(beta), 1.8.x, 1.7.x, 1.6.x, 1.5.x, 1.4.x, 1.2.x, 1.1.x, 1.0.x, 0.16.x, 0.15.x, and 0.14.x\n Older MCPE versions are not supported.\n \n \n Disclaimer\n This app is not affiliated with Minecraft, Mojang AB or Microsoft.\n This is not an official but a fan made app.\n Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB.\n Please note:\n • NOT AN OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG.\n • THE APP IS PROVIDED \"AS IS\", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND.\n \n \n 사용된 라이브러리\n • FloatingActionButton \n • Tileview, fork by mithrilmania \n • leveldb-mcpe \n with android-leveldb, fork by mithrilmania \n \n GitHub 소스 코드:\n github.com/mithrilmania/blocktopograph \n \n The app documentation can be found at (maybe out of date): blocktopograph.protolambda.com/help . Version: %1$s

Full changelog can be found at (out of date): blocktopograph.protolambda.com/changelog 월드 시드: Marker icons:\n • default_marker, blue_marker, green_marker, red_marker \n • Entity data-names (case sensitive) \n • Block data-names (case sensitive) \n 월드 목록을 다시 불러왔습니다. 어떤 월드도 찾을 수 없습니다! 월드 읽기/수정 권한이 없습니다. 여기에 사용자 지정 경로를… 사용자 지정 경로로 월드 열기 열기 Your path: %1$s\n \n Already searched for world folders in %2$s No file/folder found at path! That path (optionally suffixed with /level.dat) is not a directory! level.dat 파일을 찾을 수 없습니다! An error occurred while opening the world. Do you want to close this world? levelDB key here… Open NBT from DB Invalid key name. Cannot find db entry with that name! Failed to read \"%1$s\" from world database. No multiplayer data found. Select player NBT 열기 Failed to open player entry in DB. key: %1$s The current Minecraft world could not be opened. Try restarting this app, and close the world in MCPE if it was open. Do you want to close this world? Do you really want to close this NBT editor? Teleport local player Create custom marker Remove marker 청크 엔티티 NBT 열기 청크 블록 엔티티 NBT 열기 엔티티 청크 데이터 블록 엔티티 청크 데이터 NBT 청크 데이터 %1$s (%2$d, %3$d, %4$d) Teleported the player to (%1$.1f, %2$.1f, %3$.1f) Failed to teleport player. Failed to find/edit local player data. My custom marker Invalid marker name! Invalid icon name! Invalid marker X coordinate! Invalid marker Y coordinate! Invalid marker Z coordinate! Error: failed to create marker. Failed to load %1$s. NBT 편집기 This type of data does not yet exist for this chunk. It needs to exist first, do you want to create it? Creating and saving new NBT chunk data… Created and saved new NBT chunk data! Error: failed to create/save the new NBT chunk data. dd/MM/yyyy hh:mm a Error: could not open world details; lost track of world. Error: could not open world. no level-data available 월드 이름: 월드 크기: 게임 모드: 마지막 플레이: 월드 시드: 파일 경로: 월드 불러오는 중… \"%1$s\" is invalid! 취소 복사 붙여놓기 (덮어쓰기) 붙여놓기 (하위 태그로) 삭제 이름 수정 하위 태그 추가 NBT 태그 추가 Paste as sub-tag Remove all NBT tags Cannot edit root NBT tag. Root NBT options 여기에 태그 이름을… NBT 태그 생성 생성 클립보드가 비었습니다! Do you really want to delete all NBT tags? 삭제! 오류: failed to do NBT change. NBT 태그 설정 Error: clipboard-key already exists in the compound! Error: cannot overwrite tag: unknown parent NBT type. Error: cannot overwrite NBT in an empty parent tag. Error: cannot paste as sub-tag: unknown parent NBT type. Error: cannot remove NBT from empty list. Rename NBT tag 이름 수정 Error: parent-NBT-tag already contains that key! Error: that key already exists in the compound! Error: sub-tags can only be added to compound tags and list tags. No data has changed, nothing to save. Do you really want to save your changes? Failed to find player. Failed to find spawn. Go to a marker: Go to local player Go to other player 플레이어 생성 지점 %1$s (%2$.1f, %3$.1f, %4$.1f) %1$s at, (%2$d, %3$d, %4$d) No map available. Searching for markers… Failed to retrieve player data. Go to player Go! Go to coordinate Teleported the player to: This marker is not meant to be removed! Sub-chunk Choose a sub–chunk (0…): Filter markers 월드 표시 월드 선택 Singleplayer NBT Multiplayer NBT 월드 NBT 오버월드 Satellite 동굴 슬라임 청크 Heightmap 바이옴 Foliage color 엑스레이 Light 네더 Map 엔더 Map options Toggle grid Toggle markers/mobs Advanced Options BiomeData NBT 오버월드 NBT 마을 NBT 포탈 NBT 차원0 NBT 차원1 NBT 차원2 NBT AutonomousEntities NBT Open NBT by name 서바이벌 크리에이티브 모험 (%1$.1f, %2$.1f) Chunk(%3$d, %4$d) 순간이동! Go to spawn No worlds found. Note that newer Minecraft puts your worlds in its private data by default. For this reason, all tools won\'t be able to access the worlds. You\'d have to set Minecraft to use \"external\" storage, by go to Minecraft-> Settings->Profile->File Storage Location, and change the option from \"Application\" to \"External\". After that, newly created worlds would be accessible by Blocktopograph, while existing worlds may not be opened. You may want to google about how to move previous worlds to external. [NetEase] 평지 월드 생성 이름: 내 월드 1.2.13~최신 버전 버전: 층: 알 수 없는 오류. 잠시만 기다려주세요... 수량: Sum of amount from all layers should be at least 0 and at most 127. 층 추가하기... 편집 블록 선택 "1. Drag block icon to sort.\n" "2. Click any item to edit.\n" "3. Click \"Add\" button to add a layer.\n" "4. Swipe left to delete." "." 최소 1개 이상의 층이 필요합니다. 완료. 실패. After creating, the world will appear in Minecraft after restarting the game. 테스트 페이지 냐옹~ "\n§c환영한다~ 냐옹~""\n§rCreated by""\n§3Blocktopograph""\n""\n§1Play 스토어에서 얻을 수 있어""\n§5그리고 너만의 월드를""\n§5만들어봐!""\n""\n§rWorld generated at""\n§d%1$s" 월드 recipe:\n " §r..And more" "by_Blocktopograph.txt" "환영한다~ 냐옹~""\nThe world was created by Blocktopograph,""\nan Minecraft world editor and terrain viewer.""\nGet from Play Store and create your own customized world!" 플레이어 At (%1$d, %2$d, %3$d) of %4$s 고급 Locator... Markers 좌표 월드의\n전체 사진 얻기 사진 찍기 This would generate a picture of the world, and may crash. There are corrupted or unsupported data, skip or cancel? There\'re data from old Minecraft version in the world. You may want to cancel now, and open the world in newer Minecraft to have data automatically updated. You can also ignore these data. 무시 Cancel & Return Your world cannot be understood by Blocktopograph, perhaps your game version is too old or too new. This world is of a too old Minecraft version therefore cannot be read. No terrain found. 분석 중 생성 중 미리보기: 저장 Picture will be saved to your Download folder. 사진이 저장되었습니다. 공유 Share With 크기 선택: Each block will be one pixel\'s large. If you select a smaller area, then you will be able to scale the picture larger. 생성 시작 지점 선택 취소 선택 설정 선택 From [ , ] To [ %1$d, %2$d ] (including from and to) 범위 x 적용 Width and height shall be at least 1. Operations Lampshade Torches This would add glass shades to torches in selected area. Worlds of Minecraft Bedrock 1.4.x or higher are supported. We advice you to back up your world before any modification in Blocktopograph. Find in 백그라운드 포그라운드 Either Both Find for Foreground slot: Background slot: Then place in Foreground and background Find & Replace Ignore sub-types Simple find and replace can be done ignoring background slot. Since Minecraft BE 1.4.x, background slots are used to store water coexisting with other blocks, however they can be used to place any block. For advanced map makers you can really make good use of the feature. ALWAYS MAKE A BACKUP BEFORE PROCEED! Biome: Numeric ID of biome, 21 by default Approximately %1$dx%2$d. 청크 삭제 This would DELETE all chunks involved within your selected area. Minecraft could later generate the area again, but your progress within would be lost. Unless you know what \"chunk\" is in Minecraft and understand the consequence, you shouln\'t proceed. Don\'t just follow random online articles. Your selected area was not aligned to chunk boundary. Don\'t worry, Blocktopograph can adjust for you. The actual deleted area would be slightly larger than the selection. To be accurate, it would be 0~15 blocks larger at each side. That\'s because the area can only be re-generated if it was deleted with its containing chunks. If you don\'t like the auto-adjustment you can cancel and change the selection yourself. Continue with auto-adjust The app is dangerous, \nmake a backup before editing! Too Many Markers! There\'re too many markers on your screen, e.g. mobs. You can turn them off by clicking \"toggle markers\" in the slide drawer, or set a marker filter. drawer 열기 알겠어요 Pick A Biome Change Biome For All Specific biome Change to You can long click on map, choose \"Begin selection\" and try editing. World Too Large The world is too large. You can either:\n(1) Use a similar tool on PC;\n(2) Or begin a selection of part of the world, and choose \"Generate Picture\" from selection menu. You can scale the picture larger. One pixel per block at least. Selection Too Large Your selected area is too large. Width and height should both be within %1$d blocks, and the area should be within %2$d block²s. Generate Picture Generating Preview... Position unknown Tap screen twice to open the drawer. Something Went Wrong... 죄송합니다, something went wrong so that you would not be able to use this app. In brief, a magic part of the app is missing. \\nHave you received the app (apk file) from some one else that has previously installed the app? Then the app was optimized for that person\'s device only, even though you have the same model of device it will not work. Try uninstall and reinstall from Google Play Store may solve it. You can also download full version of the app from GitHub or other sources. In this case you may also need to remove this version of the app. Sorry for the inconvenience but this is definitely caused by your bad habit of not downloading from the right place.\\nIf it\'s not the situation then we have no idea. 닫기 Backup & Restore
